actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-320.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the amendments in disagreement to the Conference Report on H.R. 3069 making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1983, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of amendments in disagreement to the conference report on H.R. 3069 (supplemental appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against consideration of the amendments in disagreement to the Conference Report on H.R. 3069 making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1983, and for other purposes.
